text:
I am using the  WEB-INF/lib/displaytag-1.0-rc1.jar  142304 bytes

in a jsp, I have 
<% int pgSizeInt = 30; %>

...

<%@ taglib uri="/WEB-INF/lib/displaytag-12.tld" prefix="display" %>
<display:table name="sessionScope.INBOX" id="inMsgList" class="msgList"
pagesize="<%=pgSizeInt%>" requestURI

...

This works perfectly, when deploying with tomcat, when pre-compiling, I get
    [javac]
C:\Document...app\WEB-INF\src\org\apache\jsp\page_005fen_jsp.java:409:
setPagesize(java.lang.String) in org.displaytag.tags.TableTag cannot be applied
to (int)
    [javac]           _jspx_th_display_table_0.setPagesize(pgSizeInt);
    [javac]                                   ^

When I put a String.valueOf() around "pgSizeInt", it pre-compiles perfectly, but
I get the opposite error under tomcat?
creator: hauser@acm.org
kin-man.chung@sun.com
text: Couldn't verify your "bug".  You'll need to provide a test case.
